faqs.question: How do I adopt a horse?
faqs.answer: To adopt a horse, start by visiting our 'View Horses' page to learn about the horses currently available for adoption. Once you've found a horse you'd like to adopt, you can contact us via email at support@coffinacres-spiritofm46-rescue.org or call our rescue center at +1 989 620 5955. We'll guide you through the adoption process, including meeting the horse and ensuring it's the right fit for your home.

faqs.question: What is the cost of adoption?
faqs.answer: The adoption fees depend on the horse and its needs, typically ranging from $500 to $1,500. These fees cover the horse's care, including veterinary treatment, vaccinations, and rehabilitation. Feel free to contact us for specific details on individual horses and what the adoption fee includes.

faqs.question: How can I volunteer?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for passionate volunteers! To get started, please contact us via email at support@coffinacres-spiritofm46-rescue.org to discuss the opportunities available. Our volunteer program includes hands-on work with the horses, assisting with events, or helping with administrative tasks. Before starting, all volunteers must go through a brief orientation to ensure the safety and well-being of both the horses and volunteers.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you offer after adoption?
faqs.answer: We provide ongoing support to ensure a smooth transition for both the horse and its new family. This includes advice on care, feeding, and training. Additionally, we're always available for follow-up questions or concerns you might have after the adoption process is completed.

faqs.question: Can I donate to the rescue?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Donations are a critical part of how we operate and care for the horses. You can donate by visiting https://www.zeffy.com/donation-form/cf77c00a-6d88-4f4c-a77e-2eb9f3f4e9c2 and contributing online through Zeffy's secure platform. All donations go directly towards the care and rehabilitation of the horses in our rescue.
